lines.text: If you come back in, I'll hit you with so many rights you'll be begging for a left.
[Hunter gives an interview directed towards Rostov]
Nikko was easy. Now it's your turn. One night you'll close your eyes, and when they open I'll be there. It'll be time to die.

[putting a grenade in Tomas' right hand]
If you live through this, tell Rostov It's time to die.
If you come back in here, I am gonna hit you with so many rights you are going to beg for a left.
Hold it! Where are you going? I think I know you, pal.
Makes us even. I don't know you either.
You don't have to know me, jerk? You buying or selling?
Just looking.
No, no, no, no. You don't look here. This ain't no peep show. You got business, do it. You got that, huh?
I'm not sure.
[Grab the hand of the bottle of a beer]
You want to run that by me again?
[But suddenly cracked the bottle of beer in his hand by Hunter]
Ah! Ahh!
That's okay. I think I get it.
Oh!
Hi, Matt.
How's business?
Oh, just booming. Sorry. There's all sorts of amateurs out there these days that are willing to fight wars for money.
I'm looking for Rostov.
Rostov? You think he's behind all this? He can't be. He's in Europe.
He's here. I got to find him.
You know, you never had any patience, Hunter.
I don't have time. Besides, you owe me for saving you in South America.
I saw some strange new faces last night at the King Cobra. They looked real experienced. I'd say they were in business. Might be some of Rostov's people. I don't know.
[Hunter gets up and leave the bar]
See you in hell.
Send me a postcard.
[last lines]

[whispers to Rostov]
It's time.
Didn't work, huh?
[throws terrorists their own bomb and detonates it]
Now it will.
18 hours from now, America will be a different place.
Tell me something John, what are you going to do when the social security people find out you've been moonlighting?
Ain't found out about my air boat business. Been doing it for 40 years.
That's probably because you haven't made a profit in the last thirty-nine.
Matt, you wanna come to dinner tonight? We got some live ones. Fried, steamed, barbequed, your choice.

[under his breath]
God, I'm sick of frogs.
You're beginning to irritate me.
Did you lose this?
[explosion]
Congratulations on taking Nikko out.

[Hunter grabbed Adams]
It didn't help these kids, did it? For everyone I stop, a hundred succeed.
You can't stop it all.
Rostov can.
If you can find him.
I'll find him.
[Hunter handover the report to Adams]
Here's what I want you to do.
Oh, no, this is suicidal. I can't do this. The agency'll never go for it. Do you realize what kind of cooperation this'll take? Think of the risks.
Think of the stakes.
Mommy, I don't want to go. I want to stay with you and daddy.
It's not safe here anymore, honey. You'll be better off in the country away from everything.
But mommy...
We'll all be together again soon.
I love you, precious.
Bye, darling.
Now we can destroy the Americans, crush their struggling leadership, and finish Hunter as well. Go! Bring them all in. I want everyone there. GO!
